CSGO has gone down hill with constant blatant cheaters. I love this game and have put in many MANY hours in this game over the years. I wish they would stop making this game free to play. If you do want to play, play on ESEA or Faceit
God I hate this game with every ounce of my being. That being said, I give it a 10/10.

I bought this game in early October(?) 2018 and I've enjoyed it. It's really fun, and very addictive. I recommend not solo-queing. Ever. Play with your friends. If you dont have friends go play surf. I love this game, its very diverse, and it's easy to learn but takes time to really master. the levels of toxicity are annoying, and dont get me wrong, but its infectious. its hard to find a game without someone yelling at you, making you want to blow your fucking brains out and 2. The sheer number of uncooperative people who dont care about the game. "Go play faceit, bud." Like no, how's about stop trolling and let me tryhard in MM game you nerd

also official mm is 64 tick and it sucks, if you dont know what that means look it up.

Juego lleno de emociones, puedes quedarte mirando la jugada de tu amigo con la boca abierta, te pueden temblar las rodillas luego de terminar una ronda, puedes encontrar buenos amigos! 
Si eres de los tiempos que se jugaba 1.6 cs pues este juego es su hijo super desarrollado lo recomiendo 100/100

Counter strike has remained even to this day relevant and fun even throughout all the years and new games coming and going. This is one of those games you should always have in your library because it will always remains fun and consistent no matter what the new trend game may be.
